summary: Replaces the ambient exploration music in the game.
descriptionHtml:
*Release three is out! The new songs are \"Mayahem\" by Newgrounds artist TM23 and \"The Last Story\" by Squale* 

Anonymous musicians that create and upload music on the internet are overlooked artists and deserve respect and admiration for their work. Like the modding community, they work for free and are generally thankless. This mod hopes to increase exposure to their hard work. Check the credits section for full citation and a link to the author\'s work or website.

CURRENT RELEASE:

Replaces one of the morning ambient music pieces in Skyrim with the piece \"Windswept\"
Replaces a midday exploration piece with \"Eye of the Dragon\"
Replaces a nighttime ambient piece with \"The last Story\"
Replaces combat music 1 with \"Mayahem\"

Next songs on trial:
http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/90433
http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/153087
author: Thunderroar
